title: Beagle in a Backpack
description: Mandy and James are distracted from Halloween planning when local girl Amber Hutton runs away from home with a stolen beagle puppy. Clues left around a sheep farm lead the kids to believe that Amber is hiding out on the moors.But even if the girl and dog are found, will they all be able to make it safely back over the moors that are riddled with jagged holes and underground caves.
author: Ben M. Baglio
